remarks.zh:
工具申请提交IT center
关于知识产权，在输出内容中，除了我们原本就有知识产权的内容（比如上传的Kelly形象），可灵不会授予我们其它内容的知识产权。因此应格外注意上传我们已经有版权的内容，确保我们拥有输出内容的版权。
remarks.en:
Submit tool applications to the IT center.
Regarding intellectual property rights, we will not grant any intellectual property rights to any content we export, except for content for which we already own the intellectual property rights (such as the uploaded Kelly image). Therefore, we should be extremely careful when uploading content for which we already own the copyright, ensuring that we own the copyright for the exported content.
